name: Trapped in Engineering
description:
Trapped in Engineering is a game of repetition.

Made in 48 hours for the Ludum Dare Compo by Bill Wheatley.

Build & Source available at http://labs.aeps.com/ld/38/ Source Code also avail - github.com/bwheatley/LudemDare38

I know I probably made mistakes, constructive feedback is always welcome. If the feedback isn't constructive, remember when your mother told you if you don't have anything nice to say don't say anything. <3

Tools Using Unity 5.6 http://www.samcodes.co.uk/project/geometrize-haxe-web/http://www.dafont.com/neo-sci-fi.font Modeling - Probuilder - https://www.assetstore.unity3d.com/en/#!/content/3558 3DS Max

Audio Tools http://www.reaper.fm/ https://www.audiotool.com/app http://www.bfxr.net/

Thanks to my amazing wife heather and cat jasper who appear inside the game for letting me create this.

Questions? Bill@williamwheatley.com Twitter @bwheatley
